original_text: Then arose Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, and the ten men that were with him, and smote Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan with the sword, and slew him, whom the king of Babylon had made governor over the land.
korean_text: 느다냐의 아들 이스마엘과 그와 함께 있던 열 사람이 일어나서 바벨론의 왕의 그 땅을 위임했던 사반의 손자 아히감의 아들 그다랴를 칼로 쳐죽였고

sentences.original_text: Then arose Ishmael son of Nethaniah
and the ten men that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 있던 열 사람을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and smote Gedaliah son of Ahikam
son of Shaphan with the sword
whom king of Babylon had made governor over land
sentences.korean_translation: 바벨론 왕이 그를 땅의 총독으로 삼았더라
